original_text: So you must always want to love other people. Also, want very much to receive spiritual gifts from God. More than anything else, want to speak messages from God. Corinthians 11:2-16. Paul says that women may pray or speak a message in a meeting of the church. He may mean that women should not speak at certain times. That is, while a man is explaining messages from God. Corinthians 13 Corinthians 15
korean_text: 사랑을 추구하며 신령한 것들을 사모하되 특별히 예언을 하려고 하라

sentences.original_text: So you must always want to love other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 항상 다른 사람들을 사랑하고자 해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Also, want very much to receive spiritual gifts from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 하나님께로부터 영적인 은사를 받기를 매우 원해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: More than anything else, want to speak messages from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇보다도, 하나님의 메시지를 말하기를 원해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Paul says that women may pray or speak a message in a meeting of the church.
sentences.korean_translation: 바울은 여성들이 교회 모임에서 기도하거나 메시지를 말할 수 있다고 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: He may mean that women should not speak at certain times.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여성들이 특정 시간에는 말하지 말아야 한다는 의미일 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: That is, while a man is explaining messages from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 즉, 남성이 하나님의 메시지를 설명하는 동안입니다.
